xdsp::mid_side Namespace Reference

Mid-side encoding and decoding. More...

Functions

template<typename T >
void encode (T left, T right, T &mid, T &side)
 Encode a stereo signal into mid and side components.
(This assumes uncorrelated signals in left and right channels.)
 
template<typename T >
void decode (T mid, T side, T &left, T &right)
 Decode a mid-side signal into stereo components.
(This assumes uncorrelated signals in left and right channels.)

Decode a mid-side signal into stereo components.
(This assumes uncorrelated signals in left and right channels.)

41 left = (mid + side) / xdsp::consts::SQRT_2;
